location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP No. 7 To illustrate the Battle of Kut 28th. September 1915'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 194 x 162mm, on sheet 291 x 220mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume I, and shows a region to the north and east of Kut [Al KÅ«t] in central and eastern Iraq, indicating military operations, settlements and vegetation. Rivers and marshes are printed in blue.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in June 1922.
